  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>97034ecc-1c12-4305-bd3a-c5afc913e0ce#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Barna medve</string>
            <string language="en">Brown bear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brauner Bär</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ours brun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Urso marrom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orso marrone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καφετής αντέξτε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oso marrón</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A barna medve a ragadozók közé tartozik. Az északi félteke, hűvösebb területein elterjedt.</string>
            <string language="en">Brown bear belongs to the carnivores. Eurytopic on the Northern Hemisphere's chilly areas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  ragadozók,  medvefélék,  hegyvidékek élővilága,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, carnivores, ursidae, living world of mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brauner Bär gehört den fleischfressenden Tieren.
Eurytopic auf den Nordkühlen Bereichen der hemisphäre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ours brun appartient aux carnivores. 
Eurytopic sur les régions fraîches de l'hémisphère nordique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O urso marrom pertence aos carnivores. 
Eurytopic nas áreas chilly do hemisfério do norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'orso marrone appartiene ai carnivori. 
Eurytopic sulle zone fredde dell'emisfero nordico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καφετής αντέξτε ανήκει carnivores. Eurytopic στις ψυχρές περιοχές του βόρειου ημισφαιρίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oso marrón pertenece a los carnívoros. 
Eurytopic en las áreas frías del hemisferio norteño.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, fleischfressende Tiere, ursidae, 
lebende Welt der Berge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, placentalia, carnivores, ursidae, monde vivant des 
montagnes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, placentalia, carnivores, ursidae, mundo vivo das 
montanhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, placentalia, carnivori, ursidae, mondo vivente delle 
montagne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, placentalia, carnivores, ursidae, κόσμος 
διαβίωσης των βουνών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, placentalia, carnívoros, ursidae, mundo vivo de 
montañas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
